CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Loop workspace sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can apply container-level sensitivity labels to Loop workspaces to prevent oversharing and manage access effectively.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Loop workspace sensitivity labels
OldVersion.description: Users can apply container-level sensitivity labels to Loop workspaces to prevent oversharing and manage access effectively.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Portfolio capabilities in Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Structure plans into portfolios and get insights on top of your portfolios

OldVersion.title: Planner: Portfolio capabilities in Planner
OldVersion.description: Structure plans into portfolios and get insights on top of your portfolios

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Site ownership policy
CurrentVersion.description: Site ownership policy is a one-stop solution to effectively manage ownership needs of all SharePoint sites in your tenant. It helps you to define your organization's ownership criteria and identify sites that are not compliant. You can further notify predefined set of users of your choice to find the next best site owner or admin. You can also choose to automate actions on sites that remain ownerless for more than 3 months to prevent risks of data mismanagement.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Site ownership policy
OldVersion.description: Site ownership policy is a one-stop solution to effectively manage ownership needs of all SharePoint sites in your tenant. It helps you to define your organization's ownership criteria and identify sites that are not compliant. You can further notify predefined set of users of your choice to find the next best site owner or admin. You can also choose to automate actions on sites that remain ownerless for more than 3 months to prevent risks of data mismanagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Adding search to settings on Outlook for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: We recently rolled out updated settings on Outlook for iOS. To make the settings experience even better, we are now adding the ability to search within settings so that you can find exactly what you're looking for.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Adding search to settings on Outlook for iOS
OldVersion.description: We recently rolled out updated settings on Outlook for iOS. To make the settings experience even better, we are now adding the ability to search within settings so that you can find exactly what you're looking for.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Using Data Access Governance to understand the tenant's current permission landscape
CurrentVersion.description:
SharePoint admins can now use Data Access Governance (DAG) to understand their tenant's current permission landscape and make better decisions regarding applications based on permissions such as Copilot. DAG now provides a report that will reflect the latest state of permissions in the entire tenant and return sites that have a greater count of permissioned users than the SharePoint admin specified number. This count considers users accessing sites via site membership and users accessing via unique permissions, as well and acts like a potential threshold for oversharing. Along with the permissioned user count, the report also provides information on the number of existing sharing links (Anyone and People-in-your-org) in those sites and enables SharePoint admins to identify potential root causes for oversharing. You can find more details about this report at the link below.
More info: https://aka.ms/DAGReportOnPermissions

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Using Data Access Governance to understand the tenant's current permission landscape
OldVersion.description:
SharePoint admins can now use Data Access Governance (DAG) to understand their tenant's current permission landscape and make better decisions regarding applications based on permissions such as Copilot. DAG now provides a report that will reflect the latest state of permissions in the entire tenant and return sites that have a greater count of permissioned users than the SharePoint admin specified number. This count considers users accessing sites via site membership and users accessing via unique permissions, as well and acts like a potential threshold for oversharing. Along with the permissioned user count, the report also provides information on the number of existing sharing links (Anyone and People-in-your-org) in those sites and enables SharePoint admins to identify potential root causes for oversharing. You can find more details about this report at the link below.
More info: https://aka.ms/DAGReportOnPermissions

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Site Access Review offers a way for SharePoint tenants to empower site owners using Data Access Governance
CurrentVersion.description:
SharePoint admins can use Data Access Governance reports to discover potential oversharing within their tenant. Once discovered, SharePoint admins can now request that site owners review permissions using the specific context of that report from within the report. They can also track all such requests raised from a central location. The site owners will receive a corresponding email and are redirected to a section within the site (site reviews) that clearly enunciates the corresponding data related to sharing and permissions along with the ability to take action. This feature is now available for Data Access Governance - Permissions based reports - count of permissioned user report.
More info: https://aka.ms/DAGSiteAccessReviews

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Site Access Review offers a way for SharePoint tenants to empower site owners using Data Access Governance
OldVersion.description:
SharePoint admins can use Data Access Governance reports to discover potential oversharing within their tenant. Once discovered, SharePoint admins can now request that site owners review permissions using the specific context of that report from within the report. They can also track all such requests raised from a central location. The site owners will receive a corresponding email and are redirected to a section within the site (site reviews) that clearly enunciates the corresponding data related to sharing and permissions along with the ability to take action. This feature is now available for Data Access Governance - Permissions based reports - count of permissioned user report.
More info: https://aka.ms/DAGSiteAccessReviews

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse -  Viva Pulse  templates to measure Copilot readiness, adoption & impact as part of Microsoft 365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Pulse authors can now use new templates specific to M365 Copilot Readiness, Adoption & Impact to measure employee sentiment around their organization's Copilot adoption. These templates will be available as part of your Microsoft365 Copilot subscription as well.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse -  Viva Pulse  templates to measure Copilot readiness, adoption & impact as part of Microsoft 365 Copilot
OldVersion.description: Viva Pulse authors can now use new templates specific to M365 Copilot Readiness, Adoption & Impact to measure employee sentiment around their organization's Copilot adoption. These templates will be available as part of your Microsoft365 Copilot subscription as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Generate Pulse summary with Microsoft Copilot in Viva Pulse
CurrentVersion.description: Use Microsoft Copilot in Viva Pulse to receive an AI-generated summary of your results from a Viva Pulse report. Viva Pulse authors can share it with their team members as well use it to promote transparency.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Generate Pulse summary with Microsoft Copilot in Viva Pulse
OldVersion.description: Use Microsoft Copilot in Viva Pulse to receive an AI-generated summary of your results from a Viva Pulse report. Viva Pulse authors can share it with their team members as well use it to promote transparency.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Block a user for your organization
CurrentVersion.description: With the availability of the delete API (removeallaccessforuser API), it does not stop the malicious user from resending the message to the same victim. To help prevent that, a block user API will allow the admin to block the malicious user from reaching out again. To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Block a user for your organization
OldVersion.description: With the availability of the delete API (removeallaccessforuser API), it does not stop the malicious user from resending the message to the same victim. To help prevent that, a block user API will allow the admin to block the malicious user from reaching out again. To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Introducing archival and other enforcement actions with inactive site lifecycle management policy
CurrentVersion.description: Address inactive content on your tenant with inactive sites policy. Admins can configure policies to Detect inactive sites, send notifications to all site owners, and archive these sites or put them in a read-only state if there is no action from notification recipients.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Introducing archival and other enforcement actions with inactive site lifecycle management policy
OldVersion.description: Address inactive content on your tenant with inactive sites policy. Admins can configure policies to Detect inactive sites, send notifications to all site owners, and archive these sites or put them in a read-only state if there is no action from notification recipients.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Site access review from Sharing link reports in Data Access Governance
CurrentVersion.description: Site access review allows SharePoint admins to delegate access governance to site owners in the context of potential oversharing as defined within DAG reports. We earlier released site access review from within "Content shared with everyone except external users" report. Now, the same functionality will be available from all "Sharing link" reports as well.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Site access review from Sharing link reports in Data Access Governance
OldVersion.description: Site access review allows SharePoint admins to delegate access governance to site owners in the context of potential oversharing as defined within DAG reports. We earlier released site access review from within "Content shared with everyone except external users" report. Now, the same functionality will be available from all "Sharing link" reports as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Vote on and archive Questions in Teams Q&A
CurrentVersion.description: Question voting allows instance participants to upvote the most important questions and sort by highest votes or recent activity. This gives moderators the ability to derive insights from the audience about what topics they care the most about and address them. Additionally, for questions that might be outdated or irrelevant, moderators can move them to a separate feed to ensure that presenters can focus on providing the most value to attendees.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Vote on and archive Questions in Teams Q&A
OldVersion.description: Question voting allows instance participants to upvote the most important questions and sort by highest votes or recent activity. This gives moderators the ability to derive insights from the audience about what topics they care the most about and address them. Additionally, for questions that might be outdated or irrelevant, moderators can move them to a separate feed to ensure that presenters can focus on providing the most value to attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Authoring Copilot in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Authoring Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging new web pages. It can utilize built-in templates or custom templates from your organization, along with existing documents as grounding data, to generate high-quality page content. All of this is achieved while upholding our commitment to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Authoring Copilot in SharePoint
OldVersion.description: Authoring Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging new web pages. It can utilize built-in templates or custom templates from your organization, along with existing documents as grounding data, to generate high-quality page content. All of this is achieved while upholding our commitment to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose between Copilot Business Chat with web or work grounding
CurrentVersion.description: In Outlook for iOS and Android, you will soon be able to choose whether Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat uses Microsoft 365 Graph (work) or Web grounding via a Work/Web toggle within the chat interface, just like you can at microsoft365.com/chat. Web grounding will be available for all commercial Microsoft 365 customers, while Graph grounding will require a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Choose between Copilot Business Chat with web or work grounding
OldVersion.description: In Outlook for iOS and Android, you will soon be able to choose whether Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat uses Microsoft 365 Graph (work) or Web grounding via a Work/Web toggle within the chat interface, just like you can at microsoft365.com/chat. Web grounding will be available for all commercial Microsoft 365 customers, while Graph grounding will require a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Charts, Graphs and Data Analysis in Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: Use prompts to create charts, graphs, and data analysis in Business Chat.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Charts, Graphs and Data Analysis in Copilot for Microsoft 365
OldVersion.description: Use prompts to create charts, graphs, and data analysis in Business Chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
CurrentVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
OldVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extensibility for PSTN calls
CurrentVersion.description: Third-party application developers will be able to extend the PSTN calling experience in Teams with contextual information, making it possible for Teams users to have access to relevant data without leaving the call experience. This brings additional context and workflow integration into calling experiences and makes customer facing professionals more efficient by having data from line of business applications readily available. This functionality is available for developers to integrate their applications and add new functionality to calls.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extensibility for PSTN calls
OldVersion.description: Third-party application developers will be able to extend the PSTN calling experience in Teams with contextual information, making it possible for Teams users to have access to relevant data without leaving the call experience. This brings additional context and workflow integration into calling experiences and makes customer facing professionals more efficient by having data from line of business applications readily available. This functionality is available for developers to integrate their applications and add new functionality to calls.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Enhanced functionalities to manage SharePoint Embedded Containers through SharePoint Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: The new update empowers the SharePoint Embedded Administrators (SPE Admins) to manage their containers better through sorting and filtering capabilities as well as set sensitivity labels on containers. The SPE Admins now also have user role management capabilities to add, reassign, or remove users from various roles of a container.
